titles: An elegy upon the death of Mr. William Lilly the astrologer.
publisher: Printed for Obadiah Blagrave, at the Bear in St. Pauls Church-yard, near the little North Door,
notes: Verse: "OUR Prophet's gone: no longer may our Ears ..."
Within mourning border, with emblems and motto at head.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Lilly, William, 1602-1681 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
